Name: nBonds
Description: number of all bonds in non-kekulized structure

Name: nBondsO
Description: number of bonds connecting to heavy atom in non-kekulized structure

Name: nBondsS
Description: number of single bonds in non-kekulized structure

Name: nBondsD
Description: number of double bonds in non-kekulized structure

Name: nBondsT
Description: number of triple bonds in non-kekulized structure

Name: nBondsA
Description: number of aromatic bonds in non-kekulized structure

Name: nBondsM
Description: number of multiple bonds in non-kekulized structure

Name: nBondsKS
Description: number of single bonds in kekulized structure

Name: nBondsKD
Description: number of double bonds in kekulized structure

Name: DPSA1
Description: difference in charged partial surface area (version 1)

Name: FNSA1
Description: fractional charged partial negative surface area (version 1)

Name: FPSA1
Description: fractional charged partial positive surface area (version 1)

Name: WNSA1
Description: surface weighted charged partial negative surface area (version 1)

Name: WPSA1
Description: surface weighted charged partial positive surface area (version 1)

Name: FCSP3
Description: the fraction of C atoms that are SP3 hybridized

Name: ETA_beta_s
Description: sigma contribution to valence electron mobile count

Name: AETA_beta_s
Description: averaged sigma contribution to valence electron mobile count

Name: ETA_beta_ns
Description: nonsigma contribution to valence electron mobile count

Name: AETA_beta_ns
Description: averaged nonsigma contribution to valence electron mobile count

Name: ETA_beta_ns_d
Description: delta contribution to valence electron mobile count

Name: AETA_beta_ns_d
Description: averaged delta contribution to valence electron mobile count

Name: ETA_eta
Description: ETA composite index for reference graph

Name: AETA_eta
Description: averaged ETA composite index for reference graph

Name: ETA_eta_L
Description: local ETA composite index for reference graph

Name: AETA_eta_L
Description: averaged local ETA composite index for reference graph
